(D20 effect) 3 Dot - Rerolls all pickups on the entire floor 4 Dot - Rerolls all pedestal items on the floor. (Does not roll your devil deal items) 5 Dot - Reroll and restart the current floor (Forget Me Now effect) 6 Dot - Reroll all of your items and all the pickups on the entire floor (Combined 1 + 3 + 4 rooms)
blank rune: When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use
dice shard: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time
get out of jail free card: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key
? card: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free
emergency contact: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy
gold key: Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor
gold heart: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart
bone heart: Takes three hits to deplete and can be refilled with red hearts, but disappears forever when depleted
gold bomb: Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor
ace of hearts: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Hearts
ace of clubs: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Bombs
ace of diamonds: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Coins
holy card: Grants the Holy Mantle effect for, which will negate your next hit of damage REPENTANCE - The effect persist between rooms/floors
black rune: When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders
huge growth: Temporarily makes Isaac huge, giving him +7 Damage Up and +30 Range Up for the rest of the current room Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
ancient recall: Spawns 3 random cards on the floor when used Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
era walk: When used, this card will slow down enemies, Isaac's tears by -1 Shot Speed, but speed up Isaac's movement speed by +0.50 for the rest of the current room Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140
rebirth pills a - l (page 1 of 2): 48 Hour Energy - Fully recharges your active item and drops 1-2 battery pickups. Can be used with Placebo to generate infinite batteries Amnesia - Hides the floor map for the rest of the current floor (same as curse of the lost). Can be negated with Black Candle Bad Gas - Isaac farts, poisoning enemies around him Bad Trip - Deals damage to yourself Balls of Steel - +2 Soul Hearts Bombs are key - Switches number of bombs and keys Explosive Diarrhea - Spawns five live troll bombs behind Isaac, one per second Full Health - Restores all your empty red heart containers Health Down - -1 HP. If you have 1 or less heart containers, this pill becomes Health Up Health Up - +1 HP Hematemesis - Empties all but one red heart container and spawns 1-4 red hearts on the floor. Spawns coins as The Keeper I can see forever - Opens secret room and super secret room entrances on the current floor I found pills - Changes the appearance of Isaac's face for the current room (Cosmetic change only) Lemon Party - Spawns a large yellow pool on the floor around you, damaging enemies which walk in it Luck Down - Reduces your luck stat by -1 Luck Up - Increases your luck stat by +1
rebirth pills p - z (page 2 of 2): Paralysis - Prevents you from moving for a short while Pheromones - Applies the charm effect to all enemies in the room for a short while Puberty - Causes Isaac to grow hair for the rest of the run. Cosmetic change only. In Afterbirth+, taking 3 of this pill gives the Adult transformation Pretty Fly - Gives Isaac +1 fly orbital, which blocks enemy projectiles and damages fly-type enemies on touch Range Down - Reduces your range stat by -2 Range Up - Increases your range stat by +2.5 R U a wizard? - Tears will shoot diagonally for about 60 seconds. Effect persists between rooms while the time period is active Speed Down - Reduces your speed stat by -0.12 Speed Up - Increases your speed stat by +0.15 Tears Down - Reduces your tears stat by -0.28 Tears Up - Increases your tears stat by 0.35 Telepills - Teleports you to a random room when used. Has a small chance to take you to the I AM ERROR room, and a smaller chance to teleport to a Black Market
afterbirth pills: Addicted - Causes you to take a full heart of damage for all sources for the current room. Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY Friends till the end - Spawns three friendly blue attack flies Infested! - Destroys all poops in the room and spawns a blue attack spider on every destroyed poop Infested? - Spawns one blue attack spider for every enemy in the room. If there are no enemies this pill spawns 1-3 blue spiders instead One makes you smaller - Reduces Isaac's size and hitbox size One makes you larger - Increases Isaac's size, but does not affect the size of his hitbox Percs - Causes Isaac to only take half a heart of damage from all sources for the current room (The Wafer effect). Unlocked from Challenge #24 - PAY TO PLAY Power Pill - Gives you invulnerability and the ability to damage enemies for a short while (similar to The Gamekid effect) Re-Lax - Causes Isaac to spawn poops behind him while he walks for a few seconds. Similar to Explosive Diarrhea but with poop Retro Vision - Pixelates the screen for a few seconds, obscuring your vision. Happens a total of 3 times over 30 seconds ??? - Gives the curse of the maze effect for the current floor. Unlocked from Challenge #25 - Have a Heart
afterbirth+ pills: Feels like I'm walking on sunshine! - Turns Isaac invincible for a few seconds (similar to Unicorn Stump). Unlocked from the 'Sin Collector' achievement (collect every Bestiary entry) Gulp! - When used will consume your current trinket, destroying it and giving you its effect permanently. Unlocked from the 'Once more with the feeling!' achievement (complete a victory lap, defeating the lamb boss) Horf! - When used, shoots an Ipecac explosive shot. Unlocked from the 'Dedication' achievement (participate in 31 dailies in a row) I'm Drowsy... - Slows all enemies for the rest of the current room I'm excited!!! - Speeds up all enemies for the rest of the room. The effect triggers again 30 seconds after use and again 60 seconds after use Something's wrong... - Spawns a pool of black creep beneath Isaac Vurp! - Spawns the last pill you used. Spawns another Vurp! pill if no other pills were used yet. Unlocked from the 'U broke it!' achievement (collect 50 items in a single run) X-Lax - Spawns a pool of slippery brown creep beneath Isaac
o - the fool?: Drops all hearts on the floor leaving you at half a red heart. Dropped hearts may become other pickups like bombs/keys, or even pickup-related items like A Quarter or Boom!
i - the magician?: Gives you a blue aura that repels enemy projectiles, causing them to slowly curve away from Isaac and avoid hitting him Lasts for 60 seconds
ii - the high priestess?: Causes Mom's Foot to keep stomping down randomly for 60 seconds where Isaac is standing
iii - the empress?: Gives 2 HP Up and +1.5 Tears Up for 60 seconds
iv - the emperor?: Teleports you to an extra boss room, that drops a Boss room item as normal. This room isn't part of the actual floor, and leaving it returns you to where you teleported from
v - the hierophant?: Spawns 2 Bone hearts on the floor
vi - the lovers?: Spawns a random pedestal item from the current room's item pool In exchange, turns one heart container into a broken heart. Broken hearts permanently subtract from your total possible health containers
vii - the chariot?: Isaac turns to stone and can't move for 10 seconds, but your tear rate goes up significantly for the duration
ix - the hermit?: When used, all items and pickups in the current room are turned into money. Everything is sold for its shop price, e.g. Items for 15c, hearts for 3c
x - wheel of fortune?: Activates a random effect from a Dice room See the dice icon above for each possible effect
xi - strength?: All enemies in the current room are slowed and take double damage
xii - the hanged man?: You turn into the Keeper, gaining triple shot, -0.1 Speed Down for 30 seconds Enemies drop random coins while this effect is active
xiii - death?: Activates the Book of the Dead effect, spawning a bone orbital or charmed Bony for each enemy killed in the current room
xiv - temperance?: When used, this card activates 5 random pill effects one after the other
xv - the devil?: Activates The Bible effect (granting flight) and gives a Seraphim familiar for 30 seconds
xvi - the tower?: Fills the room with random rocks, pots and other objects, creating a maze between the doors It won't block any doors that exist Rocks have a pretty good chance to become tinted rocks
xvii - the stars?: Removes your oldest passive item and spawns 2 pedestal items from the current room's pool
xviii - the moon?: Teleports you to the ultra secret room on the floor The ultra secret room is a red room containing an item from the angel room item pool. Can only be accessed via the Red Key, Crystal Key or Cracked Key. Using this card will also open a pathway of red rooms back to the regular floor
xix - the sun?: When used, grants +1.5 Damage Up, turns your hearts to Bone hearts and the Spirit of the Night effect (Spectral tears and the ability to fly) for the current floor Also gives the Curse of Darkness effect that can't be removed for the current floor
xx - judgement?: Spawns a beggar Spawns a Restock machine
xxi - the world?: Creates a trapdoor to a guaranteed crawl space
rune shard: Activates a random rune effect. The effect is weaker than normal runes. These only appear if not all runes have been unlocked yet.
cracked key: This is a one-time use of the Red Key item. The main purpose of the Cracked Key is to unlock Tainted character in the Home floor without needing to find the Red Key. You can force spawn a cracked key by droping any trinket in a Boss Room or Item room, on any floor on your way down to Depths II. When you take the reverse path back up to Home, the trinket will turn into Cracked Key in the same floor/room you dropped it before.
queen of hearts: Drops 1-12 full red hearts on the floor
wild card: When used, this copies the effect of the card, pill, rune, soul stone or active item you used most recently
soul of isaac: Turns all pedestal items in the current room into rotating items, which cycle between the old item and a random new item every second This allows you to effectively reroll items like with The D6, but choose the old item as well if you want Tainted Isaac has this effect passively for all items If you use more than one in the same room, each pedestal item will cycle through +1 random item Items are chosen from the item pool related to the current item
soul of magdalene: When used, all enemies in the current room drop half a red heart that will disappear after 2 seconds if not picked up
soul of cain: When used, this Soul Stone creates Red rooms for every possible exit in the current room Red outlines of doors appear where this Soul Stone will create exits for See the Red Key item description for more information about these Red rooms behave
soul of judas: Activates the Dark Arts item effect, which turns Isaac into a ghost for a few seconds. While in this form you can walk over enemies to mark them for death. After a few seconds, he will quickly attack each target, chaining higher damage for each enemy it hits
soul of ???: When used this will cause 8 poison farts that leave a brown creep behind, and then drop 7 Butt Bombs very quickly Standing in the creep gives you +1 Damage Up and +1.35 Tears Up
soul of eve: For the current room, 14 Dead Birds fly in from off the screen and attack all enemies, dealing low but frequent damage
soul of samson: Isaac gains the Berserk! effect for 10 seconds. This gives Isaac a bone sword and he goes on a killing rampage, gaining +0.4 Speed, +3 Flat Damage Up
soul of azazel: Activates the Mega Blast item effect, which gives you a giant laser that deals x5 your tear damage per tick to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force The effect lasts for 8 seconds but does persist between rooms
soul of lazarus: When used this kills Isaac and revives him with 1/2 a red heart. You get a couple of seconds of invincibility to move away after The main benefit of this Soul Stone is that it automatically activates if you die, meaning it is effectively an extra passive life while held
soul of eden: Activates the D6 and D20 effects, rerolling all items and pickups in the room. Unlike the regular D6, rerolled items can pick from any item pool
soul of the lost: When used, Isaac dies and becomes The Lost for the current room. This gives you his ability to fly, and the Holy Mantle effect. However if you take damage a second time you die like the Lost does Same effect as touching a white fire, but only lasts one room
soul of the keeper: Spawns up to 25 random coins on the floor
soul of apollyon: Creates 15 random Locusts Locusts are variants of blue flies, except they have special effects based on the color War (Red) - Explodes when touching the enemy. The actual explosion deals flat 60 damage Pestilence (Green) - Poisons the enemy it attacks Famine (Brown) - Applies a slowing effect Death (Black) - Deals x4 damage instead of x2 Conquest (White) - Spawns 2-5 at once
soul of the forgotten: Gives you The Forgotten as a temporary familiar, with 2 Bone hearts and his bone weapon. He behaves the same as how Esau works with Jacob, following your exact movements Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies
soul of bethany: Creates 6 wisps, similar to the Book of Virtues effect Mosts wisps will be the standard blue ones, but have a chance to have random special properties
soul of jacob and esau: Spawns Esau as a temporary familiar, who copies your exact movements the same as how the Jacob & Esau character works Disappears after the current room or if he takes enough damage and dies
